title: Verify Eris functionality and Changes in Admin2 reflect on Apple Pass
custom_preconds:
As a user
I want to verify that MLB.com's Season Ticket Holder function is working properly
So that I am able to sign up without experiencing any problems.

Given the user is in admin2 and makes changes in event config
custom_steps:
WHEN
A user changes something in the event configuration and adds a pass from their iPhone
Passes are visible and accurate in the system after they are added
custom_expected:
THEN
User is expected to wait for while
And Verifies that the changes are reflected on the Apple Pass
User is able to add the pass without any errors

title: Verify MLB.com functionality for Season Ticket Holder
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on qa-gcp.mlb.com/cubs/tickets/season-tickets/waiting-list/sign up
And the Season Ticket Holder part of MLB.com is working as intended
custom_steps:
WHEN 
User clicks on the "Sign Up" button
custom_expected:
THEN 
User is taken to the sign-up page without any errors
And the sign-up page contains all relevant information for signing up for the waiting list
And the user is able to fill out and submit the form without any issues

title: Verify tix-stats-changes-processor functionality
custom_preconds:
Given the user is verifying the tix-stats-change-processor logs in DataDog
And the tix-stats-changes-processor is operational
custom_steps:
WHEN 
User Makes changes to Tlink in Admin1
User checks the logs
custom_expected:
THEN
Changes are successfully saved
Logs are moving without any unexpected errors
And the logs are moving as expected after the mapping has been saved.

title: Retreive TDC account using provider services
